{T}: Add {C}.

cards.name: Timeless Lotus
cards.oracle_text:
Timeless Lotus enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}.

cards.name: Timesifter
cards.oracle_text: At the beginning of each upkeep, each player exiles the top card of their library. The player who exiled the card with the greatest mana value takes an extra turn after this one. If two or more players' cards are tied for greatest, the tied players repeat this process until the tie is broken.

cards.name: Tome of Legends
cards.oracle_text:
This artifact enters with a page counter on it.
Whenever your commander enters or attacks, put a page counter on this artifact.
{1}, {T}, Remove a page counter from this artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Trading Post
cards.oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Discard a card: You gain 4 life.
{1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Transmutation Font
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Create your choice of a Blood token, a Clue token, or a Food token.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice three artifact tokens with different names: Search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Treasure Keeper
cards.edition: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
cards.oracle_text: When this creature dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Triplicate Titan
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, trample
When this creature dies, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with flying, a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with vigilance, and a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with trample.

cards.name: Uba Mask
cards.oracle_text:
If a player would draw a card, that player exiles that card face up instead.
Each player may play lands and cast spells from among cards they exiled with this artifact this turn.

cards.name: Unwinding Clock
cards.oracle_text: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

cards.name: Urtet, Remnant of Memnarch
cards.edition: Phyrexia: All Will Be One Commander
cards.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a Myr spell, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, untap each Myr you control.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Put three +1/+1 counters on each Myr you control. Activate only during your turn.

cards.name: Urza's Sylex
cards.oracle_text:
{2}{W}{W}, {T}, Exile Urza's Sylex: Each player chooses six lands they control. Destroy all other permanents. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Urza's Sylex is put into exile from the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Veilstone Amulet
cards.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn.

cards.name: Vexing Bauble
cards.oracle_text:
Whenever a player casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

cards.name: Viridian Longbow
cards.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

cards.name: Void Mirror
cards.oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, if no colored mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

cards.name: Ward of Bones
cards.oracle_text:
Each opponent who controls more creatures than you can't cast creature spells. The same is true for artifacts and enchantments.
Each opponent who controls more lands than you can't play lands.

cards.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
cards.oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Welding Jar
cards.oracle_text: Sacrifice this artifact: Regenerate target artifact.

cards.name: Well of Lost Dreams
cards.oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

cards.name: Zenith Chronicler
cards.oracle_text: Whenever a player casts their first multicolored spell each turn, each other player draws a card.
